answer:
The rotavirus vaccine (offered at the four month visit) should be delayed if moderate to severe vomiting and/or diarrhea is present. Your health care provider will do a health assessment prior to giving vaccines. Speak with a nurse on whether to reschedule the 4 month vaccine appointment by calling your local health unit here or HealthlinkBC  at 8-1-1.
Immunization Nurse
